author: Justin Hawkins Rides Again
description:
**JHRA is going on the road for the next few weeks while I'm on tour with The Darkness. Apologies in advance for some of the low tech look - it won't always be recorded on my phone!**
Anyway, I stopped on my way to Tulsa to talk about the furore surrounding Will Smith and his alleged  use of AI in a promo. There were melting faces, manufactured messages about musical miracles and fans with extra fingers. 
But while many laughed at his use of AI to 'enhance' the crowd, there are more serious concerns about developments that appear to be happening on this platform. 

To see The Darkness in the USA and Canada: https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/

To watch Justin Hawkins Rides Again LIVE across the UK in January, find tickets here: 
https://www.aegpresents.co.uk/event/justin-hawkins-rides-again/

To see more from me and JHRA,   my Patreon is here: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

The latest Darkness album "Dreams On Toast" is
title: Will Smith's Fans Get A Makeover...So Is It AI?

author: Justin Hawkins Rides Again
description:
Justin Hawkins Rides Again is going to look different over the next few weeks, because I'm going on tour with The Darkness to the United States of America and Canada. I'm going to feature some of the musicians from the places I'm visiting, so please leave a comment below if there's someone you'd like to see reviewed on the show. 

We'll be in Pryor OK, St Louis MO, Nashville TN, Atlanta GA, Huntsville AL, Norfolk VA, Richmond VA, Washington DC, Allentown PA, New York NY, Toronto, Kitchener and Montreal in Canada, Indianapolis IN, Detroit MI, Minneapolis MN, Milwaukee WI and Cleveland OH.

The full list of dates is here:
https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/

To come and see Justin Hawkins Rides Again LIVE across the UK, find tickets here: 
https://www.aegpresents.co.uk/event/justin-hawkins-rides-again/

To see more from JHRA,  join my Patreon here: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

The latest Darkness album "Dreams On Toast"
title: News About Justin Hawkins Rides Again.....
